duties_responsibilities.duty: Evaluate new technologies and perform space protection and threat analyses
Improve the design of aerospace systems and contribute to the direction of mission-critical solutions
Work with a large community of developers and engineers across the firm and collaborate with the client to deliver world-class solutions
Contribute to the development of new aerospace technologies and help the client expand and improve their capabilities to protect national security
Solve real-world challenges and lead astrodynamics solutions and efforts

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Aerospace Engineering, Orbital Mechanics, Physics, or Engineering Technology (Master's preferred)
